benefits.title: No Ads
benefits.description: Enjoy an ad-free experience, free from interruptions and distractions. Navigate through our platform seamlessly without any advertising clutter, providing you with a focused and immersive user experience.

benefits.title: 15MB Limitation File Size
benefits.description: Experience our services with a file size limitation of 15MB. This restriction ensures efficient usage of our platform while maintaining a balance between functionality and resource optimization.

benefits.title: Unlimited Direct Linking
benefits.description: Navigate your platform with Pixelarium direct linking.

benefits.title: Unlimited Albums
benefits.description: Explore the versatility of our platform with unlimited album creation capabilities.

benefits.title: Accelerates Image Upload
benefits.description: Speed up your experience with accelerated image upload functionality. Enjoy a swift and efficient process for uploading images to our platform, ensuring a seamless and responsive user experience.

benefits.title: Unlimited Space
benefits.description: Enjoy a swift and efficient process for uploading images to our platform, ensuring a seamless and responsive user experience.

benefits.title: Badge Title On Your Profile
benefits.description: Showcase your achievements with a badge title displayed prominently on your profile.

benefits.title: Grant Public API Access
benefits.description: Unlock the potential of our platform by granting public API access.

benefits.title: Update / Replace Picture
benefits.description: Upgrade your visual content effortlessly with our Update / Replace Picture subscription service.
